name: Can't Get Out
description:
Doors is a game where you play as a person navigating rooms The only way to progress in to traverse deeper to more rooms that get darker as you go. Controls- Movement WASD Look Mouse Left mouse click to throw keys To open doors throw a key into them and they will open. I hope you enjoy our game

Doors

by UVM Game Development Club

Marcus Elia

John Urbani

Spencer Prouty 

Robby Beattie
